title: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order Revealed! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.15.19
description:
Robinhood is giving listeners a free stock at http://games.robinhood.com

Get 15% off your first purchase at http://thirdlove.com/games

Andrea and Greg talk about their hopes for Respawn's Star Wars game, PS Name issues, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:02:45 - Housekeeping
It’s Tax Day, motherfuckers
Vancouver Meet and Greet - May 4th - kindafunny.com/events
The Roper Report   -
00:04:18 - Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order Deets
00:15:04 - PSN Names Getting Temp’ed
00:18:31 - Randy on Borderlands 3 Epic Exclusivity
00:23:45 - “I had a question about how professionals and influencers such as yourselves use public social media…” - Danreb from San Jose
00:42:02 - Goodbye, Reggie!
00:44:08 -  Robinhood
00:45:02 - Thirdlove
00:46:35 - Out today
00:49:06 - Squad Up: Kam Konek - PS4 - Kamdyman - Division 2
00:49:52 - REQUIRED READING - https://bit.ly/2v56C6f
00:50:49 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Tim

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
